Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 33rd overall pick, by Plum Grove in 1980...
Injured on 6/1/1980 with a Bruised Foot, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 6/5/1984, off Aldo Cahoon (TOL)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/17/1984, off Renato Luna (BC)...
Injured on 8/27/1985 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
Traded from Plum Grove to New Jersey on 7/20/1988 (Going to NJ: CF G. Jacobs. Going to PG: RF D. Cifuentes, 1B J. Llorent)...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 2/7/1990 to a 3-year deal worth $3,374,400 per year...
Traded from Halifax to Capital City on 3/1/1990 (Going to HAL: P T. Soto, 3B A. Vaca, 1B G. Riebe. Going to CC: CF G. Jacobs)...
Hit for the cycle against Ashburn on 4/19/1990...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Boston (FBA) on 9/7/1990...
Traded from Capital City to Malibu on 3/1/1991 (Going to CC: LF I. Graziano, P M. Daniel, P G. Mcnerney. Going to Mal: CF G. Jacobs)...
